title: Cheesy pasta with courgette and peas
description: A simple vegetarian pasta that will get you on your way to 5 a day. You can substitute the Wensleydale cheese for whatever cheese you have.
ingredients: 1 garlic clove, finely chopped or grated
85g/3oz frozen peas, defrosted under cold running water
140g/5oz whole wheat fusilli pasta, cooked according to the packet instructions, drained
salt and freshly ground black pepper
